My 2006 Scion xB with fairly good insurance for me and the car in Illinois, about $350 every 6 months. My 2003 Acura CL Type S with minimal insurance other than my bodily coverage which is the same as my Scions results in almost $600 every 6 months in Michigan. No damage coverage for the car. (Quoted for Illinois first, which the same coverage would have cost just under $200 for 6 months). Michigan has some of the most expensive insurance by the way! When transfering into Michigan, my agent actually asked if I was sitting down since before the discounts I was at almos $750 every 6 months for the Acura. Yikes!
